<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Detect Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=1487)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 324 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

By reading trace auras, you detect the presence of [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141) effects in the area. If _detect scrying_ is higher rank than a scrying effect, you gain a glimpse of the scrying creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The duration is until your next daily preparations.
name: Detect Scrying
